00001 byte* LongToByteArray(long val) {
00002   byte x[4];
00003   x[0] = (byte ) ((val >> 24) & 0xff);
00004   x[1] = (byte ) ((val >> 16) & 0xff);
00005   x[2] = (byte ) ((val >> 8)  & 0xff);
00006   x[3] = (byte ) ((val)       & 0xff);
00007 }

00009 long byteArrayToLong(byte x[4]){
00010   long val;
00011   
00012   val = ((long )  x[0]) << 24;
00013   val |= ((long ) x[1]) << 16;
00014   val |= ((long ) x[2]) << 8;
00015   val |= x[3];
00016 }

00026 long byteArrayToInt(byte x[2]){
00027   int val;
00028   val |= ((long ) x[0]) << 8;
